definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
exocrine gland/gland producing external secretion (e.g. saliva)

sentences.english: Glands may consist of only single cells that make mucus.
sentences.chinese: 外分泌腺可以仅由制造粘液的单细胞组成。

sentences.english: The prognosis of malignant endocrine tumors was further better than that of the pancreatic exocrine tumors.
sentences.chinese: 即便是恶性肿瘤，其预后亦明显好于胰腺外分泌肿瘤。

sentences.english: Saliva is secreted from the exocrine gland.
sentences.chinese: 唾液是由外分泌腺分泌出来的。

sentences.english: Toxicological effect of olaquindox on liver cells and pancreas exocrine cells of Ctenopharyngodon idellus.
sentences.chinese: 喹乙醇对草鱼肝细胞和胰腺外分泌部细胞的毒理研究。

sentences.english: Exocrine Glands may consist of only single cells that make mucus.
sentences.chinese: 外分泌腺可以仅由制造粘液的单细胞组成。

definition: exocrine gland/gland producing external secretion (e.g. saliva)
endocrine gland/gland producing internal secretion, e.g. hormone
